roleset.name: horses and lances
roleset.note: JOUST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'joust' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 36.1. (from joust.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: agentive
example.text: Amid a riot of jousting knights, circus clowns, gold-leaf centurions and creatures of the wild, lesser competitors will fall.

example.name: Don Quixote
example.text: John-1 spent a lovely Saturday afternoon *trace*-1 jousting at windmills.
